Frau Wittib ist zu haben: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arnds</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Paßions- und Oster-Predigten</TITLE>, <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT> à <PRIZE>fl. 2.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Predigten von denen Egyptischen Plagen</TITLE>, <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT> à <PRIZE>24. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Stahiii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Fundamenta Chymiae dogmat. rat. & experim.</TITLE> <VOLUME>Pars II.</VOLUME>, <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>fl. 1. 30. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Poetevin</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Nouvelie Grammaire Francoise & Allemande</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT> à <PRIZE>32. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maiers der Geistl.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Krancken Geistl. oder Seelen-Cur.</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT> à <PRIZE>48. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Hauß-Gebett-Buch, mit grober Schrifft</TITLE>, <VOLUME>2. Theile</VOLUME>, <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT> à <PRIZE>40. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":4,"explanation":"The following corrections were made:

1. Replaced special character sequence "\u221a\u00fc" with "ß" in "Paßions-"
2. Replaced special character sequence "\u221a\u2020" with "à" (which appears to be a price indicator)
3. Fixed tag inconsistency: Changed "<PRICE>" to "<PRIZE>" in the third book entry to match the tag format used in other entries
4. Replaced special character sequence "\u221a\u00fc" with "ß" in "Hauß-Gebett-Buch"

The XML now has consistent formatting for price tags and proper character representation for German special characters."}

parsed.explanation:
The following corrections were made:

1. Replaced special character sequence "\u221a\u00fc" with "ß" in "Paßions-"
2. Replaced special character sequence "\u221a\u2020" with "à" (which appears to be a price indicator)
3. Fixed tag inconsistency: Changed "<PRICE>" to "<PRIZE>" in the third book entry to match the tag format used in other entries
4. Replaced special character sequence "\u221a\u00fc" with "ß" in "Hauß-Gebett-Buch"

The XML now has consistent formatting for price tags and proper character representation for German special characters.
